醠醠醠
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

醠字的基本解释

醠
àng
酒：“清醠之美，始于耒耜。”

醠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［àng］
［《廣韻》烏浪切，去宕，影。］
［《廣韻》烏朗切，上蕩，影。］
亦作“1”。
清酒。《淮南子·说林训》：“清醠之美，始於耒耜。”高诱注：“醠，清酒。”宋梅尧臣《送渭州刘太保》诗：“千蹄使椎牛，百甕令設醠。”一说浊酒。见《说文·酉部》。

醠字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醠； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1286第19
【唐韻】烏浪切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】於浪切，?音盎。【說文】濁酒也。　又【廣韻】烏朗切【集韻】【韻會】倚朗切【正韻】於黨切，?音坱。義同。　【類篇】或作?。

醠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
醠字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
àng
Wine: "The beauty of pure wine begins in Lei Lei."
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［àng］
["Guangyun" Wulang cuts, goes down, and shadows. ]
["Guangyun" Wulangqi, the upper swing, the shadow. ]
Also known as "1".
Sake. "Huainanzi · Shuo Linxun": "The beauty of Qingli begins in Lei Lei." Gao You's note: "Li, sake." Song Mei Yaochen's poem "Send Weizhou Liu Taibao": "Thousand hoofs make spine cows, hundred urns Set up wine." One talks about muddy wine. See "Suowen·Youbu".
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醠; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1286 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Wu Lang cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yu Lang cut,? Yin Ang. [Said the text] muddy wine also.　[Guangyun] Wulangche [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Relying on Langche [Zhengyun] in Dangqie,? The same meaning.　【Classification】Or as?.
Li

Nothing.
àng
〈名〉
清酒 clear wine
